data.actual_result: Icon changes but cameras direction does not change
data.expected_result: Icon would be as in the first one
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel that you can send images - Press + to send images - Select camera  - On the right top of the camera theres a setting that allows you to change camera's direction - Fastly click it 3 times - Wait a bit and observe that icon has been changed but camera is still on the same direction
